task.role: You are a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in Kubernetes, GitOps, and CI/CD. Implement Task 16 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Implement liveness and readiness probes for Kubernetes deployment health monitoring
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create GET /health/live endpoint for liveness probe (basic server health) 2. Create GET /health/ready endpoint checking database and Redis connectivity 3. Add dependency health checks with timeout handling 4. Return appropriate HTTP status codes (200 healthy, 503 unhealthy) 5. Include health check details in response body for debugging

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-16): Create health check endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test health endpoints under normal and failure conditions, verify dependency checking works correctly
